roleset.name: give an answer, reply

example.name: respond-v: intransitive
example.text: The board has 10 business days to respond .

example.name: respond-v
example.text: People familiar with Nekoosa said its board is n't likely to meet before the week after next to respond to the bid .

example.name: respond-v: quotative response
example.text: A Boeing spokesman responded : `` All along the company has said there was no grounds for criminal prosecution . ''

propbank.arg: All along the company has said there was no grounds for criminal prosecution

example.name: respond-v: by an action response
example.text: Nashua immediately responded by strengthening a poison - pill plan and saying it will buy back up to one million of its shares , or 10.4 % of the 9.6 million outstanding .

propbank.arg: by strengthening a poison - pill plan and saying it will buy back up to one million of its shares , or 10.4 % of the 9.6 million outstanding

example.name: respond-v: with an action response
example.text: Poquet , trying to avoid the `` gadget '' label , responded with the tag line , `` The Poquet PC -- a Very Big Computer . ''

propbank.arg: trying to avoid the `` gadget '' label
with the tag line , `` The Poquet PC -- a Very Big Computer

example.name: respond-v: Medical: Arg0 as patient
example.text: In this patient , who is not responding to nonsteroidal anti - inflammatory drugs for superficial thrombophlebitis , what is round two ?

propbank.arg: to nonsteroidal anti - inflammatory drugs for superficial thrombophlebitis

example.name: respond-v: Medical: Arg0 as illness/condition
example.text: History of at least 2 urinary tract infections which have responded to treatment .

example.name: responding-n: Arg0,1
example.text: But there was a delay of about one year in his responding to the call .

example.name: response-n: Tricky example
example.text: prices dropped in response to gains in the stock market and losses in Treasury securities

propbank.arg: to gains in the stock market and losses in Treasury securities

example.name: response-n: Example with arg 1 and 2
example.text: the computer - guided selling in response to those developments

example.name: response-n: Example with arg 1
example.text: In response to what Karl Rove said

example.name: response-n: Somewhat rare arg 2 as a literal answer rather than an action/reaction
example.text: His two - word , ' no ambition ' response

roleset.note: RESPOND-V NOTES: VN class say-37.7. (from respond.01-v)
RESPONSE-N NOTES: Roleset based on respond.01. No corresponding verbnet class. Framed by Katie. (from response.01-n)

roleset.name: readily giving an answer

example.name: responsive-j: with arg1 as modifier and arg0 as modified
example.text: A culturally responsive program will seek to involve and include individuals and families of different cultures at all levels .

example.name: responsive-j: With be verb support
example.text: The steering is really responsive - I swerved really hard to the left and right like a maniac for testing purposes ...

example.name: responsive-j: All args, be support
example.text: Personnel are responsive to the individual health needs of children and youth

propbank.arg: to the individual health needs of children and youth

roleset.note: RESPONSE-J NOTES:Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification.
